experience.title: Investment Banker
experience.description: Masterkey is a boutique investment bank based in Bengaluru, India with specific focus in raising capital for  new age technology companies and has been involved in over 100+ M&A, Venture and Private Equity transactions.Roles & ResponsbiltiesPreparation of Financial models, Pitch books, Investment memorandums and other relevant collaterals for mandates and crafting narrative for investors basis detailed discussions with the promoters.Involved in business development activity for potential new mandates with research and assessment of market sizing, unit economics, competition analysis and understanding business drivers basis discussions with promoters/founders of startups primarily in technology space.Managed client work deliverables and communication with external stakeholder expectations on mandates including venture capital investors, legal, tax and financial due diligence advisors.Key Transaction Series A Fund Raise of USD 10Mn for ABI Health (Enterprise SaaS Company) from InvAscent.
experience.description_html: Masterkey is a boutique investment bank based in Bengaluru, India with specific focus in raising capital for new age technology companies and has been involved in over 100+ M&A, Venture and Private Equity transactions.Roles & ResponsbiltiesPreparation of Financial models, Pitch books, Investment memorandums and other relevant collaterals for mandates and crafting narrative for investors basis detailed discussions with the promoters.Involved in business development activity for potential new mandates with research and assessment of market sizing, unit economics, competition analysis and understanding business drivers basis discussions with promoters/founders of startups primarily in technology space.Managed client work deliverables and communication with external stakeholder expectations on mandates including venture capital investors, legal, tax and financial due diligence advisors.Key Transaction Series A Fund Raise of USD 10Mn for ABI Health (Enterprise SaaS Company) from InvAscent.

experience.title: Deputy Manager - Transaction Advisory Services
experience.description: Transaction advisory with key focus on transactions in technology space.
experience.description_html: Transaction advisory with key focus on transactions in technology space. <!---->

experience.title: Associate - Transaction Advisory Services
experience.description: Roles & ResponsibilitiesRendering financial due diligence (buy & sell side due diligence) which included understanding of the target business and analysis and commentary on historical revenue and margin trends including customer &, segment wise revenue, contractual matters, price-volume analysis.Preparation of diligence report, reflecting key business drivers, analysis of financial statements, identifying and highlighting key financial valuation considerations such as quality of earnings, working capital considerations and net debt evaluation which impact valuations and negotiations of the target company.Analyzing forecasted projections and evaluating underlying assumptions and advising clients on incorporating indemnity clauses, condition precedents and management representations as part of share purchase agreements.Worked on 10+ transactions with exposure to multiple sectors including Real Estate, Infrastructure, Pharma, Technology & Consumer.
experience.description_html: Roles & ResponsibilitiesRendering financial due diligence (buy & sell side due diligence) which included understanding of the target business and analysis and commentary on historical revenue and margin trends including customer &, segment wise revenue, contractual matters, price-volume analysis.Preparation of diligence report, reflecting key business drivers, analysis of financial statements, identifying and highlighting key financial valuation considerations such as quality of earnings, working capital considerations and net debt evaluation which impact valuations and negotiations of the target company.Analyzing forecasted projections and evaluating underlying assumptions and advising clients on incorporating indemnity clauses, condition precedents and management representations as part of share purchase agreements.Worked on 10+ transactions with exposure to multiple sectors including Real Estate, Infrastructure, Pharma, Technology & Consumer.

positions.subtitle: PwC India

Roles & Responsibilities

Independently handled audit engagements from planning the audit, understanding and evaluation of internal controls of all business processes and risks associated with its business model and financial reporting framework and review of deliverables.

Involved in IND-AS transition for a private company involved in manufacture of spares for automobile and aerospace industry

Key Clientele: Volvo India: (Automobile), Herbalife India (Healthcare), and Samsung R&D (IT).
